_id: string # from the slug, see data/processed-recipes/_processed_manifest.json. Example: thai-chicken
content: string # from the entire recipe text

metadata.title: string # from the H1 in a recipe
metadata.ingredients: string # from the H2 Ingredients section of a recipe
metadata.instructions: string # from the H2 Instructions section of a recipe
metadata.rating: number # from the Rating portion of a recipe. In the recipe text it looks like this: Rating: 8/10
metadata.diet: Array<string> # calculated separately; is one of more of enum values ["vegetarian", "vegan", "pescatarian", "dairy-free", "gluten-free"]
metadata.protein: Array<string> # calculated separately; is one of more of enum values ["beef", "vegetarian", "egg", "pork", "lamb", "chicken", "seafood", "none"]
metadata.prepTimeMinutes: number # calculated separately; is the total time in minutes to prepare the recipe, including both preparation and cooking time
